thread.title: Ger McGarr
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Ger McGarr

author: Ger McGarr
title: Ger McGarr
text: Ordered a jumper via the website on Friday morning and arrived in Dublin on following Tuesday. Price was really good. Item was well packaged and exactly as expected. Also able to pay via Amazon which was a bonus for security of payment.
